line_1: Of all that wisdom dictates, this the drift,
line_2: That man is dead in sin, and life a gift.

line_1: While frosty winds blaw in the drift,
line_2: I grudge a wee the Great-folk's gift,

line_1: Poor hav'rel Will fell aff the drift,
line_2: An' pow't, for want o' better shift,

line_1: 'But pray,' says I, 'TABITHA, what is your Drift
line_2: 'To be cover'd in Flannel instead of a Shift?
